sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 740.002 Definitions.—As used in this chapter, the term:

sections.heading: direction for disclosure of digital assets.

sections.heading: Applicability
sections.text: 740.08 Applicability.—

sections.heading: Severability
sections.text: 740.09 Severability.—If any provision of this chapter or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity does not affect other provisions or applications of this chapter which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of this chapter are severable.

sections.heading: to wills.
sections.text: to wills.

sections.heading: As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Account” means an arrangement under a terms-of-service agreement in which the custodian carries, maintains, processes, receives, or stores a digital asset of the user or provides goods or services to the user
sections.text: (2)“Agent” means a person that is granted authority t

sections.heading: (1)Subject to subsection (3), this chapter applies to:(a)A fiduciary acting under a will, trust, or power of attorney executed before, on, or after July 1, 2016;(b)A personal representative acting for a decedent who died before, on, or after July 1, 2016;(c)A guardian appointed through a guardianshi
sections.text: (1)Subject to subsection (3), this chapter applies to:(a)A fiduciary acting under a will, trust, or power of attorney executed before, on, or after July 1, 2016;(b)A personal representative acting for a decedent who died before, on, or after July 1, 2016;(c)A guardian appointed through a guardianship proceeding, whether pending in a court or commenced before, on, or after July 1, 2016; and(d)A trustee acting under a trust created before, on, or after July 1, 2016.(2)This chapter applies to a custodian if the user resides in this state or resided in this state at the time of the user’s death.(3)This chapter does not apply to a digital asset of an employer used by an employee in the ordinary course of the employer’s business.History.—s. 18, ch. 2016-46.

sections.heading: If any provision of this chapter or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity does not affect other provisions or applications of this chapter which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of this chapter ar
sections.text: If any provision of this chapter or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity does not affect other provisions or applications of this chapter which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of this chapter are severable.History.—s. 19, ch. 2016-46.
